sentences.english: He had led a cloistered existence and had little experience of ordinary life.
sentences.chinese: 除了天生的穎悟和日常舞臺經驗外，他沒有任何憑藉。

sentences.english: He had nothing behind him except his natural genius and his daily experience of the stage.
sentences.chinese: 除了天生的穎悟和日常舞臺經驗外，他沒有任何憑藉。

sentences.english: Where the quality of humor, are smart perspicacious.
sentences.chinese: 凡有幽默的素養者，都是聰敏穎悟的。
